info.description:
Description/ç®€ä»‹

[English]

TikHub is an unofficial RESTful API platform for Douyin/TikTok/RedBook.

The API we provide can only get public data, that is, anyone can access the relevant services through browsers and APPs to obtain them.

If you have any suggestions or requirements, please contact us. More features are under development, please stay tuned!

[ä¸­æ–‡]

TikHubæ˜¯æŠ–éŸ³/TikTok/å°çº¢ä¹¦éå®˜æ–¹çš„RESTful APIå¹³å°ã€‚

Announcement/å…¬å‘Š

[English]

TikHub's API will operate on a free and sponsor basis.

You can write open source software using our API and submit it to GitHub, and we will give you a certain number of API requests after the review is passed.

Or by sponsoring our developers, we will give you a certain number of API requests according to your sponsorship amount.

After logging in, you can randomly get 50-100 API requests by clicking the following link to sign in, and you can check in once every 24 hours.

https://dash.tikhub.io/

TikHub Data Analysis Service is online!

According to the feedback and needs of many customers, TikHub recently launched a brand new dy/tt customized data analysis service! Now you can quickly perform batch data collection, management, filtering, cleaning, analysis, modeling, visualization and many other operations by entering a command line, making data processing more convenient and efficient. Whether it is data analysis, data mining, data visualization, data modeling, data cleaning, data processing,

[ä¸­æ–‡]

## ç”¨é€”:

## Purpose:
- Login to get API access token
- For security reasons, when the input Token validity time is greater than 525600 minutes, it is set to 525600 (365 days).
- The default validity time is 525600 minutes (365 day)
- keep_login: Whether to keep the login state (default is True)
